content.title: Hiring Search Tool
content.description: Built a tool to search for Hiring Managers and Recruiters by using ReactJS, NodeJS, Firebase and boolean queries. Over 25000 people have used it so far, with 5000+ queries being saved and shared, and search results even better than LinkedIn!
